articles.description: Follow live text & score updates from the Champions League as Newcastle host Paris St-Germain while Man City travel to Germany to face RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Champions League: Newcastle v PSG & RB Leipzig v Man City

articles.description: Celtic seek their first points in this season's Champions League against Italian side Lazio. Follow radio and text coverage.
articles.title: Champions League: Can Celtic beat Lazio for first home win in 10 years?

articles.description: Follow live score & text updates from six fixtures in the Championship as Leicester look to reclaim top spot.
articles.title: Championship: Six games including Leicester v Preston

articles.description: The 2030 World Cup will he held across Uruguay, Argentina, Paraguay, Spain, Portugal and Morocco, Fifa confirms.
articles.title: 2030 World Cup to be held across three continents

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says a replay of the match against Tottenham "would be the right thing" after Luis Diaz's goal was wrongly disallowed.
articles.title: Klopp wants Spurs-Liverpool replay after VAR error

articles.description: Watch live coverage of Great Britain the women's team final at the World Gymnastics Championships 2023 in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.title: Watch: World Gymnastics Championships - GB in women's team final

articles.description: Get in the mood for the 2023 men's Cricket World Cup by reliving the closing stages of the 2019 final.
articles.title: How England won incredible World Cup final

articles.description: The World Cup is far from perfect and may even be 50-over cricket's fight for survival, but it should still be a superb tournament, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Imperfect World Cup is a fight for survival'

articles.description: With eight goals in his nine games for Real Madrid, England midfielder Jude Bellingham is fast becoming a hero at the Bernabeu.
articles.title: 'A little Di Stefano, a little Zidane'

articles.description: Britain's Mark Cavendish announces he will delay plans to retire in order to race in next year's Tour de France.
articles.title: Cavendish to race next year to target Tour record
